com.dhbikoff.breakout

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • ShapeDrawable
      • com.dhbikoff.breakout.Block

  • public class Block
extends ShapeDrawable
    Represents a single game block object. Extends a ShapeDrawable to include a Color value and a method for exporting the coordinates and color in order to save its state.

     int color)

    • Method Detail

      • drawBlock

        public void drawBlock(Canvas canvas)
        Draws the block to a screen canvas.
        Parameters:

      • getColor

        public int getColor()
        Returns the integer representing the block's color.
        Returns:
        color value

      • toIntArray

        public int[] toIntArray()
        Returns an integer array containing the color and coordinates of the block. Used to save a block's state to a data file. The first four values represent the block's coordinates. The last value is the block's color.
        Returns:
        integer array containing the block's coordinates and color values.
